root: ^[Ghosty seems sad about their teddy bear]

s: ^Hey, I found and fixed your teddy bear!

g-0: ^Omg yay, Thank you for finding my teddy bear!
^[You have successfully returned the teddy bear]

s: ^Of course! I’m missing something too… Is there any chance you’ve seen my parents?

g-1: ^Oh gosh! No I haven’t, but a lot of ghosts come through here. You should try one of the cars further down.
g-2: ^Wow! In that case I definitely haven’t seen them. Good luck finding them!
^Ghosty seems to be happier with their teddy bear, lets explore other cabins!
